column6: The first year of the Initiative comes to a close as members are laid to rest, drummed out, declared AWOL, or awarded their full Hero's License. See who graduates and find out what super-teams they'll be assigned to as the next era of the Initiative begins!
column7: | Captain Marvel (Carol Danvers) | Iron Man | Iron Patriot (James Rhodes) | The Initiative
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | letterer:Joe Caramagna | writer:Christos Gage | writer:Dan Slott | penciller (cover):Steve Uy
